Translations.Text: These nunquam escape nor testimentum they invenit any dominus magister help them contra DEUS! Retribution doubled them. They failed hear they failed vide
These est unus lose their anima idols they fabricated disown them
ibi est non doubt ut Hereafter they est malus losers
Prout pro those believe lead righteous vita devote their Dominus they est dwellers Paradise; they abide therein forever
example these 2 groups est blind surdus compared to seer hearer! they est equalis? Vos non take heed
Nos sent Noah his people dictus ego advenit vos prout clear warner
Vos non worship DEUS. Ego fear pro vos retribution painful feria

Dux disbelieved his people dictus Nos vide vos est non multus than human est nos nos vide ut primus people subsequentis vos est the malus among nos! Nos vide vos non possess any advantage nos. Indeed nos think vos est liars
He dictus O my people quod ego habet solid proof ex my Dominus? quod si He beatus me His mercy vos non vide it Nos iit force vos est believe therein
